#summary Defines how errors are sent back through REST
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

Normally an error is sent back, if paramaters are missing or an invalid URL was called.


= List of Errors =

|| *Code* || *Message* ||
|| 1 || not a valid Schoorbs-REST-URL ||
|| 2 || Function does not exist ||
|| 3 || Database failure ... ||
